name: 陳怡靜
objective:
This course is ONLY served to INTERNATIONAL students who are at Chinese INTERMEDIATE level. Exchange students are welcome to take it if it has vacancy. Students must be up to  B1 level(HSK4~5) or more than 18 months studying experience (more than 700 studying hours). It would be better that your English ability has been achieved to B1 at least for communicating with your classmates and teacher. You need to cooperate with people who are from multiple culture. 
The course is based on the business situation, it will be included Chinese culture, thoughts via Chinese language to present how the Chinese think. Frequently Chinese listening and speaking are necessary in this class.  Writing and reading are the skills which be also enhanced in this class. So assignments will be required. This semester we would have a real trip to practice your Chinese ability. Prepare and understand your own culture is important, we would exchange the knowledge with local students.
